attributes.action: have a brutal Police Force much like the Police Forces of mainland Europe and the U.S.A
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Crime is getting worse by the day. Every other day you hear that someone else has been put in hospital or killed because of Britains Gun/Knife culture. The only way we can actually put our foot down on such crimes if for us to have a brutal police force like mainland Europe and the U.S.A. We also need to get rid of some of the rules that prevent our police from doing what is needed
